parameter.label: Kapp Slug
parameter.tooltip: Slug of the Queue Kapp

parameter.label: Task Form Slug
parameter.tooltip: Slug of the form the task is created for

parameter.label: Summary
parameter.tooltip: A summary of what is to be worked on

parameter.label: Details
parameter.tooltip: A description of what is to be worked on

parameter.label: Days Due
parameter.tooltip: Number of days from now the task is to be completed by

parameter.label: Assignee Team
parameter.tooltip: Name of the team to assign work to (ex. "Test::Test::Test")

parameter.label: Assignee Id
parameter.tooltip: Id of the person the task will be assigned to

parameter.label: Originating System
parameter.tooltip: Source of the parent record (e.g. Kinetic Core, Salesforce ..etc)

parameter.label: Originating Id
parameter.tooltip: Id of the originating systems record

parameter.label: System Input
parameter.tooltip: Structured data that can be leveraged by the queue task form

result.name: Task Submission Id
result.tooltip: Submission Id of the completed task

result.name: Assignee Id
result.tooltip: Id of the user who completed the task

result.name: Fields JSON
result.tooltip: A JSON map of questions that were answered on the task record

messages.message: A task was created and assigned to the <%=@results['Verify Assignment']['Assigned Team']%> team
A task for your request was recently completed

task.label: Activity Update
task.value: @trigger['Message'] == "Activity Update" && @results['Has Kinetic Submission Origin']['output'].to_s == 'true' && @results.has_key?('Create Activity Record') && @results['Create Activity Record'].has_key?('Id') && !@results['Create Activity Record']['Id'].nil?

parameter.label: Task Submission Id
parameter.tooltip: Submission Id of the completed task

parameter.label: Assignee Id
parameter.tooltip: Id of the user who completed the task

parameters.parameter: <%= key = "Assigned Individual" JSON.parse(@results['Retrieve Fulfillment Values']['Values JSON'])[key]%>

parameter.label: Fields JSON
parameter.tooltip: A JSON map of questions that were answered on the task record

parameter.label: Assigned Team
parameter.tooltip: The Assigned Team

parameter.label: Assigned Individual
parameter.tooltip: The Assigned Individual

parameter.label: Originating System
parameter.tooltip: The system originating the fulfillment process

parameter.label: Originating Id
parameter.tooltip: The Id of the record originating the fulfillment process

parameter.label: Kapp Slug
parameter.tooltip: The slug of the Kapp to create the submission in

parameter.label: Form Slug
parameter.tooltip: The slug of the Form to create the submission in

parameter.label: Current Page Name
parameter.tooltip: The page to set the submission to

parameter.label: Current Page Navigation
parameter.tooltip: The direction of the next page (next or previous)

parameter.label: Values JSON
parameter.tooltip: A JSON Map of values to set into the submissions fields

parameters.parameter:
<%= values = { 'Assigned Team' => @results['Verify Assignment']['Assigned Team'], 'Assigned Team Display Name' => @results['Verify Assignment']['Assigned Team Display Name'], 'Assigned Individual' => @results['Verify Assignment']['Assigned Individual'], 'Assigned Individual Display Name' => @results['Verify Assignment']['Assigned Individual Display Name'], 'Deferral Token' => @results['Fulfillment']['deferral_token'], 'Details' => @inputs['Details'], 'Originating Id' => @inputs['Originating Id'], 'Originating System' => @inputs['Originating System'], 'Summary' => @inputs['Summary'], 'System Input' => @inputs['System Input'] }
# Extract Form Fields form_fields = JSON.parse(@results['Retrieve Queue Form']['Fields JSON']).map{|field| field.values}.flatten
# Prepare System Input fields system_inputs = JSON.parse( @inputs['System Input'] || "{}" )
# Remove the values fields, as those are "unsettable" and should be handled in other ways updatable_fields = form_fields - values.keys
# Set each updatable field if there is a matching field in the system_input fields updatable_fields.each{|field| values[field] = system_inputs[field] if system_inputs.has_key?(field) }
# Handle Status if not provided as a system input if values['Status'].nil? values['Status'] = "Open" end
# Handle Due Date if not provided as a system input if values['Due Date'].nil? values['Due Date'] = (DateTime.now + @inputs['Days Due'].to_f).iso8601 end
values.to_json%>

parameter.label: Origin Id
parameter.tooltip: Sets the submissions origin to another Kinetic Submission

parameter.label: Parent Id
parameter.tooltip: Sets the submissions parent to another Kinetic Submission

parameter.label: Id
parameter.tooltip: The Id of the submission to retrieve

task.label: Has Notes for Customer
task.value: @results['Has Kinetic Submission Origin']['output'].to_s == 'true' && JSON.parse(@results['Retrieve Fulfillment Values']['Values JSON']).has_key?('Notes for Customer') && !JSON.parse(@results['Retrieve Fulfillment Values']['Values JSON'])['Notes for Customer'].to_s.empty?

task.label: Activity Complete
task.value: @results['Has Kinetic Submission Origin']['output'].to_s == 'true' && @results.has_key?('Create Activity Record') && @results['Create Activity Record'].has_key?('Id') && !@results['Create Activity Record']['Id'].nil?

task.name: Send Fulfillment Id to Parent Run

parameter.label: Id
parameter.tooltip: The Id of the submission to retrieve

parameter.label: Recipient List
parameter.tooltip: Comma separated list of recipients (Usernames, SMTP Addresses, and/or Team Names)

parameters.parameter: <%= key = "Requested For" JSON.parse(@results['Retrieve Orig Submission']['Values JSON'])[key]%>

parameter.label: Notification Template Name
parameter.tooltip: Name of the notification template to use when sending this email

parameter.label: JSON Variables
parameter.tooltip: JSON input of miscellaneous values. These values are used to replace placeholder content in notification messages.

parameters.parameter:
<%=
key = "Notes for Customer"
note = JSON.parse(@results['Retrieve Fulfillment Values']['Values JSON'])[key]

{
  "Note" => note
}.to_json %>

parameter.label: Kapp Slug Initiating Notification
parameter.tooltip: The slug of the Kapp sending the notification (ex: catalog, queue, etc.)

parameter.label: Related Submission Id
parameter.tooltip: Id of the submission to get values for, required if using those or attachments in the message

parameter.label: Submission Id
parameter.tooltip: Id of the submission to create the activity record for

parameter.label: Data
parameter.tooltip: Data to store in the submission activity

parameters.parameter: <%= { "Assigned Team" => @results['Verify Assignment']['Assigned Team'], "Assigned Individual" => @results['Verify Assignment']['Assigned Individual'], "Status" => "In Progress", "Comments" => nil }.to_json %>

parameter.label: Description
parameter.tooltip: Description of the submission activity

parameters.parameter: <%=@inputs['Task Form Slug'].to_s.downcase.include?('approval') ? 'An Approval was Created' : 'A Fulfillment Task was Created'%

parameter.label: Label
parameter.tooltip: Label for the submission activity

parameter.label: Type
parameter.tooltip: Type of submission activity

parameter.label: Submission Id
parameter.tooltip: The Id of the submission in which the activity is related

parameter.label: Activity Id
parameter.tooltip: The Id of the submission activity

parameter.label: Updated - Data
parameter.tooltip: Data to store in the submission activity

parameters.parameter:
<%= queue_task_values = JSON.parse(@results['Retrieve Fulfillment Values']['Values JSON']) comments = queue_task_values.has_key?('Notes for Customer') ? queue_task_values['Notes for Customer'] : nil if comments.nil? if queue_task_values.has_key?('Cancellation Reason') && !queue_task_values['Cancellation Reason'].to_s.empty? comments = "Cancellation Reason -- #{queue_task_values['Cancellation Reason']}" end end decision = queue_task_values.has_key?('Decision') ? queue_task_values['Decision'] : nil denial_reason = queue_task_values.has_key?('Denial Reason') ? queue_task_values['Denial Reason'] : nil
{ "Assigned Team" => queue_task_values['Assigned Team'], "Assigned Individual" => queue_task_values['Assigned Individual'], "Status" => queue_task_values['Status'], "Comments" => comments, "Decision" => decision, "Denial Reason" => denial_reason }.to_json %>

parameter.label: Updated - Description
parameter.tooltip: Description of the submission activity

parameter.label: Updated - Label
parameter.tooltip: Label for the submission activity

parameter.label: Updated - Type
parameter.tooltip: Type of submission activity
